text: Bota is a 2014 Albanian Italian Kosovan drama movie directed by Iris Elezi and Thomas Logoreci. It stars Flonja Kodheli, Artur Gorishti, Fioralba Kryemadhi, Tinka Kurti, Luca Lionello and won the Fedeora Award at the Karlovy Vary International Film Festival in 2014. == Other websites == * Category:2014 drama movies Category:Albanian movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Kosovan movies
title: Bota (movie)
